special seen in the UI but errors got written to .log:

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 271 2005-04-13 09:55:57.593
!MESSAGE File not found:
c:\eclipse\workspaces\Development_2_2\plugins\org.eclipse.ui.ide\.settings\org.eclipse.pde.prefs.

DJ, I think the problem is in EclipsePreferences#nodeExists.  It calls getChild
with create=true, causing the deleted preference node to be recreated.  Since
the file has already been deleted from disk at this point, it fails.
*** Bug 93241 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Fix released to HEAD to not load child nodes too agressively.

Created an attachment (id=20567)
patch for org.eclipse.core.tests.resources

The fix to this bug is causing the charset tests to fail in recent nightly
builds.

This is a test case addition for ProjectPreferencesTest that reproduces the
problem using preferences API only (assertion 3.2 fails).

Long story short: after moving a project that has preferences, the project node
exists, but is empty.
DJ, should this one be reopened or you want a new PR for the test failure?

Comment 5 is wrong. Actually, the project specific node is not empty - it
contains a child corresponding to the expected qualifier, the child is not a
Preferences object, it is just a plain string (!).

The string should be ok because we do lazy loading for the child nodes. I will
open a new report for the nightly build failures.
*** Bug 94442 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Still a problem in build i0510.
Will investigate.

The problem in the latest builds is similar but not the same. I am going to
close this bug report and have entered bug 95027 for the new problem. It will be
fixed for next week but not M7.
